tool.name: Query Data Collection
tool.description: Create a data collection from documents that match the query.
tool.help:
Performs a simple *String.contains(pattern)* test on the filename using the supplied query. Result sets will be limited to 100 documents, although smaller sets can be selected by setting the *start* and *end* parameters accordingly.
The following terms may be used as search queries:
1. data 2. spoken 3. court-transcript 4. debate-transcript 5. face-to-face 6. telephone 7. written 8. blog 9. email 10. enron 11. spam 12. w3c 13. essays 14. ficlets 15. fiction 16. govt-docs 17. jokes 18. journal 19. letters 20. philanthropic-fundraising 21. solicitation-brochures 22. movie-script 23. newspaper 24. nyt 25. unknown 26. wsj 27. non-fiction 28. technical 29. travel-guides 30. twitter
'''NOTE''' Queries **do not** support wildcards.
